description:
TheDMG demonstrates how to craft stone doors for use in modular dungeon tiles done in the 2.5d method. These can be used in RPG's like D&D, Pathfinder and others.

Subscribe to DMG's other channel 7DSystem: https://www.youtube.com/7dsystem


Purchase PDFs, Booklets or DVDs to support this channel - http://www.thedmg.info/store/
Website - http://www.thedmg.info
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thedmg.info
Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/da4s2T
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheDMGinfo
Latest Subscriber Competition - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dI96D3_2-yo

Dungeon tile construction technique was influenced by the 2.5D method created by DMScotty of theDM'sCraft. His videos can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF-i5kmuwyV6N3xi5z1TElg
You may wish to also visit the forum http://dmscraft.proboards.net/ where you will find many crafters who work in similar ways.

Music: "Dominator", under royalty free license from Footage Firm Inc. (from point 1 of the agreement: You may use the Stock Files for nearly any project, including feature films, broadcast, commercial,industrial, and educational video, print projects, multimedia, games, and the internet, as long as the Stock Files have been incorporated into any work with substantial value added by you.)
title: How to Make Miniature Stone Doors for Dungeons and Dragons DMG#049
